name: Hydro Power? Not Here!
title: Negligible Hydroelectric Production
description: In 2021, only 0.0008% of Guyana's electricity production came from hydroelectric sources, indicating a minimal reliance on this renewable energy form.

name: Low Carbon Footprint Champs
title: Minimal CO2 Emissions from Waste
description: Guyana emitted just 0.0001 Mt CO2e from waste in 2023, showcasing its low carbon footprint in waste management.

name: Living on the Edge
title: High Population in Low Elevation Areas
description: In 2015, 78.48% of Guyana's population lived in areas below 5 meters elevation, highlighting vulnerability to rising sea levels.

name: Designs in the Making
title: Minimal Industrial Design Applications
description: With only 1 industrial design application in 2021, Guyana shows limited activity in resident industrial design innovation.

name: Industrial Boom
title: Remarkable Industrial Growth
description: Guyana experienced a staggering 98.53% growth in its industry sector, including construction, in 2022, marking a significant economic expansion.

name: Stable Economy
title: Moderate GDP Deflator
description: In 2023, Guyana's GDP deflator was 91.02, indicating a stable economic environment with controlled inflation.
